description:
Course last update Jan 2016.

JOIN OVER 2400+ STUDENTS IN MY COMMUNITY WHO ARE GENERATING MORE SALES LEADS FOR THEIR BUSINESS EVERY DAY.

We challenge you to generate more sales leads using our proven strategy and tactics over the next 7 days and into the future. Are you ready?

Let's take a look at what's inside the 7 day challenge:

Day 1 - Identify what's wrong with your website

Use the right calls to action, get your unique value proposition across and make your website navigation meaningful

Day 2 - Create two piece of awesome content

With over 20 different types of content you can create easily

Day 3 - Create a landing page with a data capture form

To turn strangers into prospects

Day 4 - Publish and distribute your content

Getting you exposure for your great content

Day 5 - Create and send an email campaign about your content

Leveraging your existing audience for content engagement

Day 6 - Engage with your audience

By knowing how to and when to respond to comments

Day 7 - Commit to content creation

We'll block out time in your diary and plan resource so you can keep the content creation going

----

It's time to take that first step

Enrol now by filling in your name and email address and clicking enrol now!

At the end of this course, you will be able to...

  • Create a landing page on Unbounce
  • Create a email campaign on mailchimp
  • Create 2 pieces of content (like a video, article or blog post)
  • Distribute content through 3 different channels (Owned, Earned and Paid)
  • Engage with subscribers in a planned and structured manner
  • Commit to content creation using an editorial planner

Who should take this course?

  • This course is for newbies and intermediate marketers/business owners that want to generate sales leads through digital marketing
  • This course is probably not for you if you're looking for more advanced tactical digital marketing methods

What will you need to know or do before starting the course?

  • You will probably own a business or be responsible for generating sales sales (i.e. New business development or Marketing Department)
  • Or you maybe thinking about starting a business and would like to understand whats involved in generating sales leads

Every minute you delay is actually COSTING your business money ....

Enrol now!
title: Content Marketing: A 7 Day Mini Challenge To Get More Sales
